channel.title: Alert variable url has two forward slashes
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
The alert works as it should but we've set up the notification to use the alert variables and both the alert_url and the redash_url have an extra forward slash after dot com. Example: "https://redash.teamname.com//alerts/number"
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: 10.1 * Browser/OS: Chrome/Windows 10

item.title: Alert variable url has two forward slashes
item.dc:creator: jen_raff
item.description:
Issue Summary

The alert works as it should but we’ve set up the notification to use the alert variables and both the alert_url and the redash_url have an extra forward slash after dot com. Example: “https://redash.teamname.com//alerts/number”

Technical details:

  • Redash Version: 10.1
  • Browser/OS: Chrome/Windows 10

Read full topic
